Class EventsRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.RestClient<EventsApi>
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client.EventsRestClient

  • public class EventsRestClient
extends RestClient<EventsApi>
    Class used to make requests to the events API.

        Parameters:
        server - the server url
        thirdPartyInstanceId - the third party instance id (optional)
        includeAllNetworks - true to search in all the connected network
        callback - the asynchronous callback

      • loadPublicRooms

        public void loadPublicRooms(java.lang.String server,
                            java.lang.String thirdPartyInstanceId,
                            boolean includeAllNetworks,
                            java.lang.String pattern,
                            java.lang.String since,
                            int limit,
                            ApiCallback<PublicRoomsResponse> callback)
        Get the list of the public rooms.
        Parameters:
        server - search on this home server only (null for any one)
        thirdPartyInstanceId - the third party instance id (optional)
        includeAllNetworks - true to search in all the connected network
        pattern - the pattern to search
        since - the pagination token
        limit - the maximum number of public rooms
        callback - the public rooms callbacks

      • syncFromToken

        public void syncFromToken(java.lang.String token,
                          int serverTimeout,
                          int clientTimeout,
                          java.lang.String setPresence,
                          java.lang.String filterId,
                          ApiCallback<SyncResponse> callback)
        Synchronise the client's state and receive new messages. Based on server sync C-S v2 API.

        Synchronise the client's state with the latest state on the server. Client's use this API when they first log in to get an initial snapshot of the state on the server, and then continue to call this API to get incremental deltas to the state, and to receive new messages.

        Parameters:
        token - the token to stream from (nil in case of initial sync).
        serverTimeout - the maximum time in ms to wait for an event.
        clientTimeout - the maximum time in ms the SDK must wait for the server response.
        setPresence - the optional parameter which controls whether the client is automatically marked as online by polling this API. If this parameter is omitted then the client is automatically marked as online when it uses this API. Otherwise if the parameter is set to "offline" then the client is not marked as being online when it uses this API.
        filterId - the ID of a filter created using the filter API (optional).
        callback - The request callback

      • searchMessagesByText

        public void searchMessagesByText(java.lang.String text,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> rooms,
                                 int beforeLimit,
                                 int afterLimit,
                                 java.lang.String nextBatch,
                                 ApiCallback<SearchResponse> callback)
        Search a text in room messages.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to search for.
        rooms - a list of rooms to search in. nil means all rooms the user is in.
        beforeLimit - the number of events to get before the matching results.
        afterLimit - the number of events to get after the matching results.
        nextBatch - the token to pass for doing pagination from a previous response.
        callback - the request callback

      • searchMediasByText

        public void searchMediasByText(java.lang.String name,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> rooms,
                               int beforeLimit,
                               int afterLimit,
                               java.lang.String nextBatch,
                               ApiCallback<SearchResponse> callback)
        Search a media from its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the text to search for.
        rooms - a list of rooms to search in. nil means all rooms the user is in.
        beforeLimit - the number of events to get before the matching results.
        afterLimit - the number of events to get after the matching results.
        nextBatch - the token to pass for doing pagination from a previous response.
        callback - the request callback

        Parameters:
